long_description: Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds stay in place and deliver supreme sound to your ears in low-profile comfort. Adjustable, over-the-ear hangers conform to a wide range of ear shapes and sizes to anchor the buds in place for a secure fit, even during sports and other physical activities. Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds feature 15mm-diameter speakers, 1.2m cord and a 3.5mm gold-plated plug.
short_description: Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds stay in place and deliver supreme sound to your ears in low-profile comfort.
